WorkItem.Description:
I've donwloaded and unzipped Rawr (tried with both winzip and winrar if that makes a difference) but doubbleclicking the icon just gives me this message (translated from danish):
Rawr.exe - Program error
The program did not succeed in being initialized correctly (0xc0000135). Click OK to terminate the program.
And thats about it. Can anyone please help me?

Comments.Message:
"Please search for existing threads on your issue before creating new threads. Also, check out the Help menu in Rawr. It has lots of helpful information about common questions.
* If you get a 'The application failed to initialize properly (0xc0000135)' or similar error when starting Rawr you most likely don't have .NET Framework installed. You can get it from http://www.microsoft.com/NET/."

Both copied from the very large text at the top of the Discussions page.
